info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Big Sioux River Near Florence affecting Grant County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Big Sioux River near Florence.
* WHEN...From early this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, The water reaches the bottom of the bridge 1 mile east and 1 1/2 mile north of the gauge At 9.0 feet, The water reaches the bottom of the bridge 1 mile north of the gauge
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 AM CDT Thursday was 8.1 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Friday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
